import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Today.css" import history from '../../Assets/history.png' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function Today() { const {todaysTasks,todaysDoneTasks} = useSelector((state)=> state.userSlice) const [showDoneTasks,setShowDoneTasks] = useState(false) const [task,setTask] = useState("") return (

{setTask(e.target.value)}} value={task}>

) } export default Today
